TOOLTIPS.CREATION_USER: Name of the user of the creation
TOOLTIPS.MODIFICATION_USER: Name of the user of the last change

DIALOG.SEARCH.SUBHEADER: Viewing and Managing Products and their Apps
DIALOG.SEARCH.APPS.LABEL: Apps
DIALOG.SEARCH.APPS.TOOLTIP: Search and Management of Microfrontends and Microservices
DIALOG.SEARCH.APPS.SUBHEADER: Searching and Management of Microfrontends and Microservices

TOOLTIPS.APP_ID: Unique ID - base identifier for this App
TOOLTIPS.APP_TYPE: Type of the App: Microfrontend or Microservice
TOOLTIPS.PRODUCT_NAME: Name of the Produkt the App is assigned to
TOOLTIPS.GROUP.REMOTE_MODULE: Details of the remote module to be used
TOOLTIPS.GROUP.LOCAL_MODULE: Details of the module's local registration
TOOLTIPS.GROUP.INTERNALS: More details of object management and usage
TOOLTIPS.DEPRECATED: If set, then this app is marked as obsolete. It can currently be used but will no longer be available in the future.
TOOLTIPS.DEPRECATED_SEARCH: This app is marked as deprecated. It can currently be used but will no longer be available in the future.
TOOLTIPS.UNDEPLOYED: If set, this APP can no longer be used. Further use leads to error messages.
TOOLTIPS.UNDEPLOYED_SEARCH: This app is no longer usable. Further use leads to error messages.

TOOLTIPS.ID: Unique technical ID of the Product
TOOLTIPS.NAME: Unique Name of the Product
TOOLTIPS.OPERATOR: How the Product was created? Set at creation time
TOOLTIPS.IMAGE_URL: URL for an image outside the Product Store
TOOLTIPS.BASE_PATH: The basic path through which the product can be accessed. It must be unique across all products
TOOLTIPS.ICON_NAME: Name of the icons from the PrimeNG icon library. Used, for example, as a default icon for menu entries
TOOLTIPS.CLASSIFICATIONS: Comma-separated list of terms to classify the product, e.g. Game, Tool etc. Can be used for filtering
TOOLTIPS.UNDEPLOYED: If set, then this product can no longer be used. Further use of its apps leads to error messages.
TOOLTIPS.UNDEPLOYED_SEARCH: This product can no longer be used. Further use of its apps leads to error messages.

HTTP_STATUS_0.PRODUCTS: Unknown problem retrieving Product data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_0.APPS: Unknown problem retrieving App data - please try again.

HTTP_STATUS_403.PRODUCTS: You have no permissions to see Products.
HTTP_STATUS_403.APPS: You have no permissions to see Apps.

HTTP_STATUS_500.PRODUCTS: Unknown server problem retrieving Product data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_500.APPS: Unknown server problem retrieving App data - please try again.
